Name: Wrap
Description: You attempt to grapple a target into submission. Make a melee attack roll. On a hit_ the target takes normal damage and is grappled. At the beginning of each of its turns_ it may attempt to escape with a STR save against your Move DC. As long as the target is grappled on your subsequent turns_ this move can be activated again as a bonus action with an automatic hit_ dealing normal damage.
